page.title: 19TOURISM ON WHALSAY
page.content: Whalsay,because of its remoteness,has in the past not been very accessible for tourists.The difficulty of getting here has been added to in that there has been no hotels or guest houses on the island. Today tourists would have no problem in getting here.There is now a guest house,a self catering chalet,1 or 2 self catering caravans and at least one place for bed & breakfast. Apart from seeing the island itself anyone visiting could come for the birdwatching,we get many rare migrants here;fishing,both sea angling and trout;sailing;golf;walking.These are a few of the activities that would interest a tourist.
